Html:
I just tried to build oxite but got 28 Errors most of them say:

Error    1    The type or namespace name 'Practices' does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft' (are you missing an assembly reference?)    D:\MyData\Documents\Visual Studio 2008\Projects\sail4you_on_Oxite\Oxite\Oxite\Validation\ValidationService.cs    7    17    Oxite

If I take a look into the reference Folder I also see that this Reference can't be found, where can I get it?

I am using Visual Web Developer, ist this the problem does oxite require a higher version of Visual Studio?

Greetings
Johannes

You need to go through the 'getting started' page (http://www.codeplex.com/oxite/Wiki/View.aspx?title=gettingstarted&referringTitle=Home) and do the 'Installing Dependencies' portion. I believe this error is specifically due to Unity, but they all need to be installed.
Ok this will be it, sometimes it's better to read some lines before :-). Thanks anyway.
